languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, после расконсервации тайного цеха Леди Теодоры на Кьяве Гамма началась эпидемия загадочной технопроказы. Аугменты мутируют в искаженные формы, убивая носителей, станки и целые сборочные цеха распадаются на куски, которые пожирают друг друга и переплавляются в гротескные и безумные формы. Мануфакторум Омега-18, ставший очагом эпидемии, оцеплен. Но рано или поздно болезнь вырвется".

"Lord Captain, after the unsealing of Lady Theodora's secret workshop on Kiava Gamma, an epidemic of mysterious tech-leprosy has broken out. Augments mutate into distorted forms, killing their hosts. Machines and even entire assembly halls break apart into fragments that devour each other, fusing into grotesque and insane forms. The Omega-18 manufactorum, the epicentre of the epidemic, is cordoned off, but the disease will burst out of there sooner or later."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, после расконсервации тайного цеха Леди Теодоры на Кьяве Гамма началась эпидемия загадочной технопроказы. Аугменты мутируют в искаженные формы, убивая носителей, станки и целые сборочные цеха распадаются на куски, которые пожирают друг друга и переплавляются в гротескные и безумные формы. Мануфакторум Омега-18, ставший очагом эпидемии, оцеплен. Но рано или поздно болезнь вырвется".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, after the decompression of Lady Theodora's secret guild on Kiava Gamma, an epidemic of mysterious tech-leprosy had broken out. The augments mutate into distorted forms, killing their hosts, the machines, and entire assembly halls break up into pieces that devour each other and meld into the grotesque and insane forms. The Omega-18 manufactorum, that became an epicentre of the epidemic, is cordoned off. But the disease will break out of there sooner or later."

"Lord Captain, after the decompression of Lady Theodora's secret guild on Kiava Gamma, an epidemic of mysterious tech-leprosy had broken out. The augments mutate into distorted forms, killing their hosts, the machines, and entire assembly halls break up into pieces that devour each other and meld into the grotesque and insane forms. The Omega-18 manufactorum, that became an epicentre of the epidemic, is cordoned off. But the disease will break out of there sooner or later."

The Omega-18 manufactorum, the epicentre of the epidemic, is cordoned off, but the disease will burst out of there sooner or later."

The Omega-18 manufactorum, the epicentre of the epidemic, is cordoned off. But the disease will burst out of there sooner or later."

The Omega-18 manufactorum, the epicentre of the epidemic, is cordoned off, but the disease will burst out of there sooner or later."

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们解封了西奥多拉夫人在基亚瓦伽马星的秘密车间，随后便爆发了某种神秘的技术腐败病。植入物变异为扭曲的形状，杀死了宿主。无数机器失去控制，就连整座装配礼堂都分裂成无数碎片，自相残杀，彼此吞噬，融合成了某种怪诞而疯狂的东西。我们已经封锁了疫病爆发的中心，禁止任何人出入欧米伽18号工厂，但这种疾病迟早会从蔓延到其他地方。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, after the unsealing of Lady Theodora's secret workshop on Kiava Gamma, an epidemic of mysterious tech-leprosy has broken out. Augments mutate into distorted forms, killing their hosts. Machines and even entire assembly halls break apart into fragments that devour each other, fusing into grotesque and insane forms. The Omega-18 manufactorum, the epicentre of the epidemic, is cordoned off, but the disease will burst out of there sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们解封了西奥多拉夫人在基亚瓦伽马星的秘密车间，随后便爆发了某种神秘的技术腐败病。植入物变异为扭曲的形状，杀死了宿主。无数机器失去控制，就连整座装配礼堂都分裂成无数碎片，自相残杀，彼此吞噬，融合成了某种怪诞而疯狂的东西。我们已经封锁了疫病爆发的中心，禁止任何人出入欧米伽18号工厂，但这种疾病迟早会从蔓延到其他地方。”
“舰长大人，我们对西奥多拉夫人在基亚瓦伽马星的秘密车间进行减压之后，某种神秘的技术腐败病爆发了。植入物变异为扭曲的形状，杀死了宿主，摧毁了机器。就连整座礼堂都分裂成无数碎片，自相残杀，彼此吞噬，融合成了某种怪诞而疯狂的东西。我们已经封锁了疫病爆发的中心，禁止任何人出入欧米伽18号工厂，但这种疾病迟早会从蔓延到其他地方。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, tras la clausura del taller secreto de lady Theodora en Kiava Gamma, se ha desatado una misteriosa epidemia de tecnolepra. Los aumentos mutan en deformidades y matan a sus dueños. Las máquinas, e incluso salas de montaje enteras, se rompen en pedazos que se devoran entre sí para unirse en formas grotescas y dementes. El manufactorum Omega-18, epicentro de la epidemia, está aislado, pero la enfermedad escapará tarde o temprano».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, after the unsealing of Lady Theodora's secret workshop on Kiava Gamma, an epidemic of mysterious tech-leprosy has broken out. Augments mutate into distorted forms, killing their hosts. Machines and even entire assembly halls break apart into fragments that devour each other, fusing into grotesque and insane forms. The Omega-18 manufactorum, the epicentre of the epidemic, is cordoned off, but the disease will burst out of there sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, tras la clausura del taller secreto de lady Theodora en Kiava Gamma, se ha desatado una misteriosa epidemia de tecnolepra. Los aumentos mutan en deformidades y matan a sus dueños. Las máquinas, e incluso salas de montaje enteras, se rompen en pedazos que se devoran entre sí para unirse en formas grotescas y dementes. El manufactorum Omega-18, epicentro de la epidemia, está aislado, pero la enfermedad escapará tarde o temprano».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、キアヴァ・ガンマにあるレディ・シオドーラの秘密工房が開封された後、謎の技術的感染症が蔓延しています。オーグメントは歪んだ形状に変異し、自らの宿主と機械を壊しています。集会場全体が、グロテスクで狂気めいた形状に溶けながら、互いを貪り食う断片へと分裂しているほどです。この流行の震央であるオメガ18聖工場は封鎖されていますが、感染症は遅かれ早かれそこから吹き出してくることでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, after the unsealing of Lady Theodora's secret workshop on Kiava Gamma, an epidemic of mysterious tech-leprosy has broken out. Augments mutate into distorted forms, killing their hosts. Machines and even entire assembly halls break apart into fragments that devour each other, fusing into grotesque and insane forms. The Omega-18 manufactorum, the epicentre of the epidemic, is cordoned off, but the disease will burst out of there sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、キアヴァ・ガンマにあるレディ・シオドーラの秘密工房が減圧された後、謎の技術的感染症が蔓延しています。オーグメントは歪んだ形状に変異し、自らの宿主と機械を壊しています。集会場全体が、グロテスクで狂気めいた形状に溶けながら、互いを貪り食う断片へと分裂しているほどです。この流行の震央であるオメガ18聖工場は封鎖されていますが、感染症は遅かれ早かれそこから吹き出してくることでしょう」

「ロード・キャプテン、キアヴァ・ガンマにあるレディ・シオドーラの秘密工房が減圧された後、謎の技術的感染症が蔓延しています。オーグメントは歪んだ形状に変異し、自らの宿主と機械を壊しています。集会場全体が、グロテスクで狂気めいた形状に溶けながら、互いを貪り食う断片へと分裂しているほどです。この流行の震央であるオメガ18聖工場は封鎖されていますが、感染症は遅かれ早かれそこから吹き出してくることでしょう」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, après l'ouverture de l'atelier secret de dame Théodora, une mystérieuse épidémie de technolèpre s'est déclarée sur Kiava Gamma. Les augmentations mutent en déformations monstrueuses, tuant leurs hôtes. Des machines et des salles d'assemblage entières se délitent en fragments qui se dévorent les uns les autres, avant de se réagréger en assemblages cauchemardesques. Le manufactorum Omega-18, qui se trouve à l'épicentre du phénomène, a été placé en quarantaine. Mais tôt ou tard, le mal finira par s'étendre au-delà de la zone d'exclusion. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, after the unsealing of Lady Theodora's secret workshop on Kiava Gamma, an epidemic of mysterious tech-leprosy has broken out. Augments mutate into distorted forms, killing their hosts. Machines and even entire assembly halls break apart into fragments that devour each other, fusing into grotesque and insane forms. The Omega-18 manufactorum, the epicentre of the epidemic, is cordoned off, but the disease will burst out of there sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, après l'ouverture de l'atelier secret de dame Théodora, une mystérieuse épidémie de technolèpre s'est déclarée sur Kiava Gamma. Les augmentations mutent en déformations monstrueuses, tuant leurs hôtes. Des machines et des salles d'assemblage entières se délitent en fragments qui se dévorent les uns les autres, avant de se réagréger en assemblages cauchemardesques. Le manufactorum Omega-18, qui se trouve à l'épicentre du phénomène, a été placé en quarantaine. Mais tôt ou tard, le mal finira par s'étendre au-delà de la zone d'exclusion. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, nach der Entsiegelung von Lady Theodoras geheimer Werkstatt auf Kiava Gamma ist eine mysteriöse Epidemie der Tech-Lepra ausgebrochen. Augmentationen mutieren zu verzerrten Formen, die den jeweiligen Wirt töten. Maschinen und ganze Montagehallen zerfallen in Fragmente, die einander verschlingen und zu grotesken, wahnsinnigen Formen verschmelzen. Das Manufactorum Omega-18, das Epizentrum der Epidemie, wurde abgeriegelt. Aber die Krankheit wird früher oder später daraus hervorbrechen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, after the unsealing of Lady Theodora's secret workshop on Kiava Gamma, an epidemic of mysterious tech-leprosy has broken out. Augments mutate into distorted forms, killing their hosts. Machines and even entire assembly halls break apart into fragments that devour each other, fusing into grotesque and insane forms. The Omega-18 manufactorum, the epicentre of the epidemic, is cordoned off, but the disease will burst out of there sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, nach der Entsiegelung von Lady Theodoras geheimer Werkstatt auf Kiava Gamma ist eine mysteriöse Epidemie der Tech-Lepra ausgebrochen. Augmentationen mutieren zu verzerrten Formen, die den jeweiligen Wirt töten. Maschinen und ganze Montagehallen zerfallen in Fragmente, die einander verschlingen und zu grotesken, wahnsinnigen Formen verschmelzen. Das Manufactorum Omega-18, das Epizentrum der Epidemie, wurde abgeriegelt. Aber die Krankheit wird früher oder später daraus hervorbrechen."

"Lord Captain, nach der Dekompression von Lady Theodoras geheimer Werkstatt auf Kiava Gamma ist eine mysteriöse Epidemie der Tech-Lepra ausgebrochen. Augmentationen mutieren zu völlig verzerrten Formen, wodurch der Wirt und die Maschinen getötet werden. Selbst ganze Montagehallen zerfallen in Fragmente, die einander verschlingen und zu grotesken, wahnsinnigen Formen verschmelzen. Das Manufactorum Omega-18, das Epizentrum der Epidemie, wurde abgeriegelt. Aber die Krankheit wird sich früher oder später darüber hinaus ausbreiten."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Leydi Theodora'nın Kiava Gama'daki gizli atölyesi açıldıktan sonra esrarengiz tekno cüzzam vakaları görülmeye başlandı. Gözlemlediğimiz kadarıyla şekli bozulan ogmentler, sahiplerinin ölümüne yol açıyor. Makineler ve hatta koca montaj salonları, birbirini yutan parçalara ayrılıp garip ve akıl almaz biçimlere bürünüyor. Salgının merkezi olan Omega 18 manufaktorumu kordon altına alındı. Ancak hastalığın eninde sonunda yayılacağı aşikâr."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, after the unsealing of Lady Theodora's secret workshop on Kiava Gamma, an epidemic of mysterious tech-leprosy has broken out. Augments mutate into distorted forms, killing their hosts. Machines and even entire assembly halls break apart into fragments that devour each other, fusing into grotesque and insane forms. The Omega-18 manufactorum, the epicentre of the epidemic, is cordoned off, but the disease will burst out of there sooner or later."

Ancak hastalığın eninde sonunda yayılacağı aşikâr."
